body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope 
xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
 xmlns:edx="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/edXML" 
 xmlns:ages="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/agesbXML"
 xmlns:oneg="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/onegateXML">
    <soapenv:Header xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
        <ns3:MessageHeader xmlns:ns3="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/edXML">
            <ns3:From>
                <ns3:OrganId>28</ns3:OrganId>
            </ns3:From>
            <ns2:FieldCode xmlns:ns2="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/agesbXML">06</ns2:FieldCode>
            <ns2:ProcessCode xmlns:ns2="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/agesbXML">97</ns2:ProcessCode>
            <ns2:TypeCode xmlns:ns2="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/agesbXML">01</ns2:TypeCode>
        </ns3:MessageHeader>
    </soapenv:Header>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <edx:MessageBody>
            <ns2:BusinessData xmlns:ns2="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/agesbXML"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="ns2:BusinessData">
                <ns1:ThongTinHoSo xmlns:ns1="http://angiang.gov.vn/schemas/agesb/onegateXML">
                    <ns1:MaBNHS>HS-DEMO-07-12-2023-00003</ns1:MaBNHS>
                    <ns1:TenToChuc />
                    <ns1:TenNguoiNop>TEST</ns1:TenNguoiNop>
                    <ns1:DiaChiNguoiNop>123, Phường Đông Xuyên, Thành phố Long Xuyên, Tỉnh
			An Giang</ns1:DiaChiNguoiNop>
                    <ns1:SoCMND>351351351</ns1:SoCMND>
                    <ns1:DienThoai>0911161762</ns1:DienThoai>
                    <ns1:TenDVCong>Thủ tục đăng ký LLTP</ns1:TenDVCong>
                    <ns1:NgayNhanHS>2020-06-03 15:25:03</ns1:NgayNhanHS>
                    <ns1:NgayHenTraHS>2020-06-04 15:25:03</ns1:NgayHenTraHS>
                    <ns1:TinhTrangHS>Hồ sơ mới tiếp nhận</ns1:TinhTrangHS>
                    <ns1:TrangThaiXuLy>0</ns1:TrangThaiXuLy>
                    <ns1:PhongBanXuLy/>
                    <ns1:CVXuLy>Phạm Ngọc Huệ</ns1:CVXuLy>
                    <ns1:DuLieuChuyenNganh></ns1:DuLieuChuyenNganh>
                </ns1:ThongTinHoSo>
            </ns2:BusinessData>
        </edx:MessageBody>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
